meanings.definition: A sweet, creamy topping for cakes and pastries.
meanings.sent1: The frosting on the cake was pink and delicious.
meanings.sent2: She spread the frosting evenly over the cupcakes.
meanings.sent3: The frosting on the cupcake made it look like a tiny edible hat.
meanings.sent4: The frosting on the cake was as fluffy as a cloud.
meanings.sent5: The frosting was so sweet, it made her smile with every bite.

meanings.definition: The act of covering something with frosting.
meanings.sent1: Her frosting of the cupcakes was meticulous and neat.
meanings.sent2: The frosting of the cake was done with care and precision.
meanings.sent3: He tried frosting his own shoes, thinking it would make them look tasty.
meanings.sent4: The frosting of the house with snow made it look like a winter wonderland.
meanings.sent5: The frosting of the cookies was so thick, it almost looked like snow.
